title: "Zedshadow missing"
body:
Whenever I play with/Against a zed it would crash my game whenever the zed would cast his shadow
how do I fix this?

replies.body:
Hey Darksoul3454,

If this is a rerecording event, I would suggest performing a system repair. Please note that a system repair may take a while, and would delete any custom item sets you may have.
